original_text: Behold, a people shall come from the north, and a great nation, and many kings shall be raised up from the coasts of the earth.
korean_text: 보라 한 민족이 북쪽에서 오고 큰 나라와 여러 왕이 충동을 받아 땅 끝에서 일어나리니

sentences.original_text: Behold, a people shall come from the north
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 한 민족이 북쪽에서 올 것이다

sentences.original_text: and many kings shall be raised up
from the coasts of the earth
